test_scenarios.name: Homepage Load and Basic Navigation
test_scenarios.expected_result: Homepage loads without errors. 'Top Deals' page loads successfully.

test_scenarios.name: Search for a Product and View Details
steps: Click on the first search result (a laptop).
test_scenarios.expected_result: Search results page displays laptops. The selected laptop's product details page loads successfully.

test_scenarios.name: Add Product to Cart and Proceed to Checkout
steps: From the product details page of a laptop, click 'Add to Cart'.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The laptop is added to the cart successfully. The cart page loads correctly. The checkout page loads correctly.  (Note: We are NOT testing placing the actual order here).
